OOC oops meant to send this before post 15853

BIC Veratis walked outside with Lunarpine, "Now that I can trust you." he
pressed a button on his left leg.

 Lunarpine could feal a surge of power going through his body. He'd fealt
different before but he now knew that Veratis had him on less than half
power. "This is incredable" he exclaimed in his excitement. "What have you
made me?" the details raced through his mind as he considered how easily he
could shred Veratis but for Shadow Wings sake he'd play along.

"Veratis sneered, he could sense what was going through Lunarpines mind "I
have made you more like me." Veratis transformed into bat mode and began
flying away from the ship. "Follow me."

Lunarpine transformed to wolf mode and began chasing Veratis, The bat was
the fastest flyer he'd encountered on this planet and somehow Lunarpine was
keeping up. Veratis changed direction without warning, remarkably Lunarpine
changed just as quickly.

Veratis landed atop a valley miles away and waited for Lunarpine, The wolf
shot up the side of the cliff like he'd done it a million times. Lunarpine
landed next to Veratis turned to face the bat. "You're fast for an old bot."

"Thank you"Veratis answered "Look" Veratis nodded his head in the direction
they'd just come from. Lunarpine followed his gaze .

Lunarpine fell silent as he looked back toward the ship. He couldn't see it
from there, he could barely see the peaks of the camoflauge Veratis had used
to cover the ships."What do you think about your new body now?" Veratis
asked already knowing the answer. Lunarpine and Veratis had covered hundreds
of miles in no time and Lunarpine barely fealt any fatigue.

Veratis could understand the silence, he saw the same response when he'd
given his daughter her new form.  "You think that's impressive? Watch."
Veratis transformed.  Before Lunarines eyes stood a creature that he didn't
know, it appeared to be half bot half Bat. "Impressive, am I right?"
Lunarpine stepped back not knowing what would come next. "Try it, Think
halfling."

In a spark of energy Lunarpine began to transform "Howllllllllll" He changed
into a beast of large proportions that walked on two legs, (Darkstalkers
fans think John Tallbane, Gigemon fans think Were Garouroumon.)  he still
had his wolfs head legs and tail, his arms were transformed into powerful
muscular arms that could tear a bot in two, the only response he could think
of was "Now I'm impressed."

The two transformed back to beasts and started back toward the base
----- Original Message -----
From: <minime_316@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 21, 2000 2:53 PM
Subject: Re: ARK


>
> Prebon
>
> Prebon laughed.
>
> "Excellent! Now, here is the plan. In a few days we'll all go on a
> scout mission at The Ark. You'll tell us which one is Ramulus. I than
> threaten to kill you if he doesn't meet me one on one. If he does,
> Striker goes home. If he doesn't, Striker gets the chip. If Ramulus
> does meet me, than I give him the chip and use him as my middle man
> to control the Maximals! You may go. You can look at Striker all you
> want. But if he wakes up, no mentioning of what I have just told you.
> The only thing I will alow you to say is "I am Master Prebon's now."
> As soon as he wakes up tell me, so the torture can begin. No leaving
> the ship without my permission and no helping him to escape!" Prebon
> was about to walk away, but he turned back.
>
> "Oh, and I hope you know what you've gotten yourself into. I said
> Striker would go. Not you. To save him you have sacrificed a future
> with him. You could've been with him forever, but you decided to sell
> out your friends and lose your love. Have a nice day!"
>
> Prebon left her laughing.
>
>
>
>
